short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TechMesto offers informative guides to help people use their smartphones and computers more effectively.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TechMesto is a technology blog primarily focusing on "tutorials". The idea is to offer guides which are easy to understand for somebody who is not techy. So, we provide detailed and setp-by-step procedures which allow a person of any age group to grasp and perform the same on his/her smart devices. 

This extension is designed to offer 1-click access to the latest content at TechMesto. 
Simply click the "tm" icon in the top-right of your Chrome browser to read the latest articles published at TechMesto. You can also use the search bar at the top to quickly search the website for your query.
